name: Motion
description:
This file includes a bunch of experiments with interactive components in Figma to create some motion in your design.

On the day of publishing this file to the community, Figma interactive components are available in Beta.

This feature from Figma created a great impact to each design system out there. I am set to work more on incorporating interactive components into my designs.

.

Please comment to let me know how these experiments helped you or for any suggestions.
